subject: talk to sales
description_text:
Hello, I'm interested in placing an order for 500 units, but I'd like to
discuss some details. Is it possible to speak to you here or another sales
department?

conversations.body_text: Hi Rodrigo Baronio,  ​Could you please let us know which products you’d like to order? Also, could you share some details about your company and sales channels? This information will help us better understand your needs and provide a more suitable cooperation plan.

Thank you for your feedback. We are a Brazilian company, Pro Racing
Simulators. We have been developing our products since 2018. We have a
complete catalog. We produce our pedals in Brazil and would like to have
our production in China, or use another product that can come with our
brand for Brazil. Initially, we thought about changing some features of
your pedal, such as the logos, the pedal controller box, using ours to use
our software, and the product box.

https://loja.prsim.com.br/

Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal without base plate and without shaker

[image: image.png]
